line_1: In wiser Dreams the Politician prys
line_2: Through distant Kingdoms with his half-shut Eyes:

line_1: Not He, who thro' th'unhappy Future prys,
Not He, who thro' th'unhappy Future prys,
line_2: Must of the Two be held most Fortunate and Wise.

line_1: In ev'ry creek and corner prys,
line_2: Each lock and ev'ry bolt he trys,
